org.apache.flink.graph.drivers.parameter

接口 Parameterized

  • 所有已知子接口:
    Driver<K,VV,EV>, Input<K,VV,EV>, Output<T>, Transform<II,IO,RI,RO>
    所有已知实现类:
    AdamicAdar, CirculantGraph, ClusteringCoefficient, CompleteGraph, ConnectedComponents, CSV, CSV, CycleGraph, DriverBase, EchoGraph, EdgeList, EmptyGraph, GeneratedGraph, GeneratedMultiGraph, GraphKeyTypeTransform, GraphMetrics, GridGraph, Hash, HITS, HypercubeGraph, InputBase, JaccardIndex, OutputBase, PageRank, ParameterizedBase, PathGraph, Print, RMatGraph, Runner, SingletonEdgeGraph, StarGraph, TriangleListing

    public interface Parameterized
    A configurable command-line choice, such as an input or algorithm.

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void configure(ParameterTool parameterTool)
      Read parameter values from the command-line arguments.
      java.lang.String getName()
      A unique, human-readable identifier.
      java.lang.String getUsage()
      Human-readable format for the command-line usage string.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        A unique, human-readable identifier. Presented to the user as the name of a selectable choice.
        返回:
        parameter name

      • getUsage

        java.lang.String getUsage()
        Human-readable format for the command-line usage string.
        返回:
        command-line documentation string

      • configure

        void configure(ParameterTool parameterTool)
        throws ProgramParametrizationException
        Read parameter values from the command-line arguments.
        参数:
        parameterTool - parameter parser
        抛出:
        ProgramParametrizationException - when configuration is invalid
